Plot summary

Lin Xiangling and Xiao Yuan home

When night fell, Lin Xiangling got into Xiao Yuan's car and went to Xiao Yuan's home. At Xiao Yuan's home, her grandmother gave her a dream that she had awakened a special ability, but when she returned to class the next day, the police told her that her dormitory roommate had died, and she was arrested as a suspect. But the "friendly" teacher Wang released Lin Xiangling on bail and let her stay alone in a luxury hotel! And in room 404!
The night of the hotel is not destined to be peaceful, careful investigation does not miss every clue, it will be easier to pass!
